result.eng: At the start of the seventies people started to return home.
result.ga: i dtús na seachtóidí thosaigh daoine ag filleadh ar ais abhaile
result.orig: I dtús na seachtóidí thosaigh daoine ag filleadh ar ais abhaile
result.html: i dtús na seachtóidí thosaigh daoine ag filleadh ar ais abhaileAt the start of the seventies people started to return home.
result.ponchtml: i dtús na seaċtóidí ṫosaiġ daoine ag filleaḋ ar ais aḃaileAt the start of the seventies people started to return home.

result.html: lean siad abhaile méThey followed me home.
result.ponchtml: lean siad aḃaile méThey followed me home.

result.eng: They came home from the party.
result.html: tháinig siad abhaile ón chóisirThey came home from the party.
result.ponchtml: ṫáinig siad aḃaile ón ċóisirThey came home from the party.

result.ga: tá mé ag dul abhaile
result.html: tá mé ag dul abhaileI am going home.
result.ponchtml: tá mé ag dul aḃaileI am going home.

result.eng: It is time for Mícheál and Siubhán to go home.
result.ga: tá sé in am do mhícheál agus do shiubhán dul abhaile
result.orig: Tá sé in am do Mhícheál agus do Shiubhán dul abhaile
result.html: tá sé in am do mhícheál agus do shiubhán dul abhaileIt is time for Mícheál and Siubhán to go home.
result.ponchtml: tá sé in am do ṁíċeál agus do ẛiuḃán dul aḃaileIt is time for Mícheál and Siubhán to go home.

result.eng: You will be able to take books home and make use of the computers.

result.ponchtml: cén t-am a n-imíonn tú aḃaileWhat time do you go home?

result.ga: slán leat a mháire slán abhaile

result.html: slán leat a mháire slán abhaileGoodbye, Máire. Safe home.

result.eng: After they returned home, the Prime Minister met them.
